examples.example: 他脖子上一挂着精美的玉佩，整个人显得很有气质。

translate.english: He has an exquisite jade pendant hanging around his neck, and the whole person appears to be very temperamental.

examples.example: 果园里一挂挂葡萄像珍珠般晶莹剔透，让人看了满心欢喜。

translate.english: The clusters of grapes in the orchard are as crystal clear as pearls, making people feel full of joy when looking at them.

examples.example: 门口一挂红灯笼，为新年增添了许多喜庆的氛围。

translate.english: A red lantern hanging at the door adds a lot of festive atmosphere to the New Year.
